sentences.en: Both housings are waterproof to a depth of two metres.
sentences.cn: 两个机罩的防水深度均为两米。

sentences.en: Breathable, waterproof clothing is essential for most outdoor sports.
sentences.cn: 大多数户外运动衣服必须透气且防水。

sentences.en: Designed to be completely waterproof, the lights are manufactured from heavy duty plastic.
sentences.cn: 为了彻底防水，这些灯具均采用重型塑料制成。

sentences.en: His breeches , his white rubber shoes and his jauntily slung waterproof expressed youth.
sentences.cn: 他的马裤, 那双雪白橡胶鞋,以及洒脱地甩在肩上的雨衣,都焕发着青春.

sentences.en: His waterproof trousers were brand new and stiff.
sentences.cn: 他那条防水裤崭新笔挺。

sentences.en: I wax my boots chiefly to waterproof them.
sentences.cn: 我给靴子打蜡主要是为了防水.

sentences.en: It is completely waterproof, yet light and comfortable.
sentences.cn: 它防水性能非常好，但却轻巧舒适。

sentences.en: My mother bought me a waterproof watch.
sentences.cn: 我妈妈给我买了一块防水手表.

sentences.en: My watch is shockproof and waterproof.
Rub the wax in to make the shoe waterproof.
sentences.cn: 在鞋子上抹点蜡使其防水。

sentences.en: Sitting there in a well - worn waterproof, she talked with striking familiarity of the courts of Europe.
sentences.cn: 她坐在那儿,穿着一件旧雨衣, 谈笑自若,显得对欧洲各国的风土人情多么熟悉.

sentences.en: Take waterproof clothing — Orkney weather is unpredictable.
sentences.cn: 带上防水的衣服吧——奥克尼的天气可是变幻莫测的。

sentences.en: There was a waterproof canopy over the platform.
Use a good waterproof adhesive in addition to the screws.
sentences.cn: 除了螺钉外,还要用优质防水黏合剂.

trans.tran_en: a jacket or coat that does not allow rain and water through it
